#summary Checking out all guests from a booking with multiple guests.

== Process ==

  # Click Bookings
  # For Date (from) and Date (to) select today's date.
  # Under "Match Dates By", select Check-Out Date.
  # Keep name blank (for all) or enter the name of the person checking out.
  # Click Search.
  # Click on the "Exit" icon of the matching booking to checkout.
  # Click OK on the confirmation dialog.
